title: Ergpy
summary:
# Ergpy

- [ergpy](https://github.com/mgpai22/ergpy) is a python-jvm wrapper for interacting with the Ergo blockchain. ## Resources

- [SigmaParticle](https://github.com/dzyphr/SigmaParticle), A framework for interacting with ergo blockchain based on ergpy to be used in cross chain pipeline extensions

sections.heading: Ergpy
sections.content: ergpy is a python-jvm wrapper for interacting with the Ergo blockchain.

sections.heading: Resources
sections.content: SigmaParticle, A framework for interacting with ergo blockchain based on ergpy to be used in cross chain pipeline extensions
